comment: /**  * Is renormalization enabled?  * @return {@code true} if renormalization is enabled or {@code false} otherwise  */
code: /**  * Is renormalization enabled?  * @return {@code true} if renormalization is enabled or {@code false} otherwise  */ boolean isEnabled().

comment: /**  * Update the anomaly score field on all previously persisted buckets  * and all contained records  */
code: /**  * Update the anomaly score field on all previously persisted buckets  * and all contained records  */ void renormalize(Quantiles quantiles).

comment: /**  * Blocks until the renormalizer is idle and no further quantiles updates are pending.  */
code: /**  * Blocks until the renormalizer is idle and no further quantiles updates are pending.  */ void waitUntilIdle().

comment: /**  * Shut down the renormalization ASAP.  Do not wait for it to fully complete.  */
code: /**  * Shut down the renormalization ASAP.  Do not wait for it to fully complete.  */ void shutdown().
